mainText:
I never got to meet steve jobs. but he was a friend. i would often talk to 
him in my head. he was like my other. some one who would critique me. jonathan ive said that you can tell the intentions of some one or the company by
 the product that they make. i felt like you knew steve becuase he put everything he had into the art that he made. ive never been sad about a celebrity. but im sad. steve jobs was an artist. he inspired people through the work that he made. my job would not exsist without steve jobs. i am going to
 work towards making a brighter future like steve did.
author: Greg
